TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XpsSignatureDefinition extends System.Object

span.span: Represents an digital signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需中的簽章定義[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]套件，請參閱第 10 章中 XML Paper Specification (XPS) 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see Chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). 如需數位簽章，請參閱 MSDN 文章 Digital Signing Framework of Open Packaging Conventions 網址[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494). 如需[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]請參閱 XML Paper Specification (XPS) 下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立和設定的屬性。The following example shows how to create and set the properties of an . summary.span: 取得或設定簽章意願合約的字串值，這是簽署者所簽署的合約。

span.span: Gets or sets the string value of the signature intention agreement that the signer is signing against.

value.span: ，表示意願合約，例如：「我已經閱讀並同意」。

span.span: A that represents the intention agreement; for example, "I have read and agree."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊`Intent`中的簽章定義的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]套件，請參閱第 10 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `Intent` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following example shows how to set this property. summary.span: 取得或設定人員的識別，該人員要求簽署 (或已經簽署) 套件。

span.span: Gets or sets the identity of the person who is requested to sign (or has signed) the package.

value.span: A表示簽署者，例如 「 Mary Jones，行銷部門 」

span.span: A that represents the signer, for example, "Mary Jones, Marketing Dept."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至`SignerName`的屬性`SignatureDefinition`中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝。This property corresponds to the `SignerName` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package. 請注意不同的名稱。Notice the difference in the names. 如需詳細資訊`SignerName`屬性，請參閱章節 10[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `SignerName` attribute, see chapter 10 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following example shows how to set this property. summary.span: 取得或設定日期和時間，要求的簽署者必須在指定的文件中簽署這個部分。

span.span: Gets or sets the date and time by which the requested signer must sign the parts of the specified document.

value.span: () ，表示簽署者必須簽署套件的期限。

span.span: A () that represents the deadline by which the signer must sign the package.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊`SignBy`中的簽章定義的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]套件，請參閱[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `SignBy` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following example shows how to set this property. summary.span: 取得或設定套件簽署所在的法定轄區。

span.span: Gets or sets the legal jurisdiction where the package is signed.
A that represents the jurisdiction, for example, "State of Utah, United States."
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會對應至`SigningLocation`項目中的簽章定義[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝。This property corresponds to the `SigningLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages. 請注意不同的名稱。Notice the difference in the names. 原始的生產者[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝可以設定此屬性。The original producer of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package can set this property. （選擇性） 簽署者也可以設定屬性，當時的簽署封裝，如果沒有其他人已經有登入。Optionally, the signer can set the property at the time of signing the package if no one else has already signed. 如需詳細資訊`SigningLocation`項目，在中，請參閱章 10[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `SigningLocation` element, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 的唯一識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this .

value.span: A ()表示簽章定義的識別碼。

span.span: A () that represents the ID of the signature definition.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要連結`Signature`至此項目，您必須設定`Id`屬性`Signature`的值屬性。To link a `Signature` element to this , you must set the `Id` attribute of the `Signature` to the value of the property. 如需詳細資訊`Signature`項目，請參閱[Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx)結構描述。For more information about `Signature` elements, see the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema. 如需詳細資訊`SpotID`的屬性`SignatureDefinition`中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]封裝，請參閱第 10 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `SpotID` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx). ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following example shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/CSharp/SignatureDialog.xaml.cs#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)] [!code-vb[XpsReadWriteSign#SignatureDefinitionCommandHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsReadWriteSign/visualbasic/signaturedialog.xaml.vb#signaturedefinitioncommandhandler)]

summary.span: 取得或設定位置，指定要在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 文件中的哪個位置顯示可見的數位簽章。

span.span: Gets or sets the location that specifies where to display the visible digital signature in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.

value.span: ，表示套件中的位置，這是簽章的可見要求出現的地方。

span.span: A that represents the location in the package where a visible request for a signature appears.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊`SpotLocation`中的簽章定義的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]套件，請參閱第 10 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS： 規格，並授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `SpotLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
